    • getAllOrdersForCustomer

      @GetMapping("/customer/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<com.example.brickorderingapi.model.Order>> getAllOrdersForCustomer(@PathVariable String id)
      Used to return all Order objects stored for a specified customer reference
      Parameters:
      id - Customer reference number
      Returns:
      List This returns a list of all Order Objects relating to the customer.

    • editOrderById

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> editOrderById(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam int quantityOfBricks)
      Used to edit an Order object
      Parameters:
      id - Order reference number
      quantityOfBricks - the new quantity of bricks
      Returns:
      String This returns the order reference of the edited Order.

    • createOrder

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createOrder(@RequestParam String customerReference, @RequestParam int quantityOfBricks)
      Used to create an Order object
      Parameters:
      customerReference - customer reference number
      quantityOfBricks - the quantity of bricks
      Returns:
      String This returns the order reference of the created Order.
